snippet: Melissa Chiu, the Asia Society Museum director, is named the new leader of the Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden in Washington.
abstract: Melissa Chiu, director of Asia Society Museum in New York, has been chosen to lead Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden in Washington; Hirshhorn, division of the Smithsonian, has been trying to regain its footing after series of bruising fights over finances, leadership and direction.

byline.original: By PATRICIA COHEN and CAROL VOGEL

lead_paragraph: Melissa Chiu, the Asia Society Museum director, is named the new leader of the Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden in Washington.

headline.main: Asia Society Museum Director to Lead Hirshhorn
headline.print_headline: Asia Society Museum Director to Lead Hirshhorn
